segments.text: We offer many different sea water treatments .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The aquamedic pool is included . You can choose three .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll do the seaweed wrap , the jet bath , and the foot massage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Here are your robes . You can go shower first .
segments.speaker: S2
